update Indent
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL},

where indentId = #{indentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update Indent set type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, publishId = #{publishid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publishTime = #{publishtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, planTime = #{plantime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where indentId = #{indentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from Indent where state=0 and publishId != #{publishId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select * from Indent where state=0 and publishId!=#{publishId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and type= #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
